name: mopnm
params: class c0, class c1, class c2

stmt.origin: syl(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wcel(c1, c2), wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, c1)))
stmt.pretty: syl(c0 ∈(*Met ` c1), c1 ∈ c2, c2 ∈(TopOn ` c1))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wcel(c1, c2))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, c1)))
-| wi(wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c1, c2))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wcel(c1, c2))
-| wi(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, c1)))
-| wi(wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c1, c2))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, c1)))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(cmopn, c0))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wcel(c1, c2))
-| wi(wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(c1, c2))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(cmopn, c0))
cumulated.pretty:
⊢ (c0 ∈(*Met ` c1)→ c1 ∈ c2)
⊣ (c2 ∈(TopOn ` c1)→ c1 ∈ c2)
⊣ c2 =(MetOpen ` c0)

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, cfv(cxmet, c1)), wcel(c1, c2))
-| wceq(c2, cfv(cmopn, c0))

comment: The base set of a metric space is open. Part of Theorem T1 of [Kreyszig] p. 19. (Contributed by NM, 4-Sep-2006.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 12-Nov-2013.)
